name: Chocolate Shake
description: Richness of the sweet,roasted cocoa makes you desire those irresiatable flavours and transcends you straight to heaven.

name: Oreo Chocolate Shake
description: We took the Oreo dunk to the next level! The good old cream and cookie shake now with a rich chocolate flavour.

name: Cold Coffee
description: This is a classic flavour combo made with refeshing coffee,ice and chocolate syrup, made to suit your palette.

name: Strawberry Shake
description: When we say strawberry, you say yum! Have a swig to know what we mean.

name: Vanilla Shake
description: If there was such a thing as a comfort shake, it would be a vanilla shake

name: Mango Milkshake
description: Refreshing mango and ice cream perfectly balanced in a milshake.

name: Blueberry Shake
description: The sweet tartness of bluberries meets the crunch of cookies. Encased in rich milkshake.

name: Choco Chip Chocolate Shake
description: Balancing the thick texture with the delightful and gooey crunch of choco-chips in a milkshake.

name: Banana Shake
description: Beautiful mix of banana and cream mixed with rich ice cream n milk.

name: Chocolate Hazelnut Shake
description: The earthy nutty flavours of hazelnut,combined with rich cocoa flavours of chocolate: a match made in heaven.

name: Kit-Kat Shake
description: The shake for when you need a break!Chocolate wafers blended with vanilla icecream for a timeless favourite.

name: Virgin Mojito
description: The virgin Mojito is a basically non-alcoholic drink.If life gives you lemon, make mojito out of it.

name: Blue Berry Soda
description: This Blueberry Soda soothes your body and mind with a lingering taste of Blueberry. The drink is rejuvenating and healthy.

name: Shikanji/Lemonade
description: This is a refreshing drink to quench your thirst. Lemon soda is instant and quick to make, helps in digestion too.
